title: SSW skins have very poor graphic quality.
body: Is it just me or do the SSW skins, e.g. the thresh skin, full champions and effects quality and it looks like a picture with poor resolution. Same with talon his blades look a little sketchy. Maybe I was just thinking to highly of what they should look like or what but yeah. Anyone else think this??

replies.body: I have it set full and its decent enough for most of the other champs and skins to look good hahaha. its just them skins that look meh.

Maybe it glitched and it's using the lower quality models/textures for those skins. Have you tried repairing your client?

Also, if that doesn't work, try setting the graphical quality setting for champions to low and then back up to high. Maybe just refreshing the cache might make them look proper.

PS: Reply with the "Reply" button, so that I get notification of it.
What graphics settings are you on? What graphics card do you have, and do you have any software designed to enhance your graphics in any way?
